body_html: @SsnL I see, thanks very much! I actually tried applying transformations (in torchvision.transforms module), but I failed to realize that a Tensor can be convert back to PIL image and then apply those transforms at that time, so I tried to subclass the dataloader iter. Anyway, thank you guys for your time! @apaszke 👍

body: @SsnL I see, thanks very much! I actually tried applying transformations (in torchvision.transforms module), but I failed to realize that a Tensor can be convert back to PIL image and then apply those transforms at that time, so I tried to subclass the dataloader iter.  Anyway, thank you guys for your time! @apaszke 👍
